content.detailedDescription:
i was talking on the telephone looking at the ocean.  what made me first take notice was the brightness of the fireball and the pulsation of the light.  note: the 2 fireballs were sighted in positions the sky where no stars are noted in a standard celestial constellation map.  i have lived on the east coast of north carolina for 5 years and i have never seen any stars located in this area of the sky.
     the objects were located in the east in the 2 o���clock position just above the ocean.  the lights were colored a reddish/magenta, larger than a star in diameter, and appearing as a bright light.  the objects were approximately the size of two stars combined and circular in diameter. the lights came on brightly and pulsated in color becoming brighter and shutting off.  the lights came back on in different positions of the sky moving to a different position each time they came on.  note:  the sky was cloudy and there were no other stars in the sky.  the objects appeared in locations/positions in the sky where no stars are noted in a standard celestial constellation map. 
      i have seen these objects at least 6 or 7 times in 2012 so i was not astounded. these sightings have become common place living here on the ocean and i'm always excited to see them again.  i have noticed a pattern with these fireballs:  they are sighted frequently before and after the full moon around the hours of 9pm-12. i feel like these fireballs are part of my every day reality.  i would like some answers as to what these things are and what is it they are actually doing?  
      i lost sight of the objects after approximately 1 hour of viewing them.
content.summary: The lights were colored a reddish/magenta larger than a star in diameter and appearing as a bright light.  the objects were approximately the size of two stars combined and circular in diameter.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I had just moved into my apartment in hattiesburg within a couple months time, it was a low altitude overcast at night, but clear in certain areas.

 at the time i did not have a bed, i was a poor college student with a floor bed made out of my comforter and blankets on the floor in my bedroom. it got to be about 2:30am at night from a serious session of computer gaming. at about 2:40am i'd say, i had just laid down in my "bed"; i have a single large window in my bedroom which i close the blinds at night, the way i close them is facing downwards so i can look up at the sky laying near the window (head and body laying straight from the window, not sideways).

 as i take a look through the blinds, an extremely bright object came into my view near the side of the window, now at this point to me it looks exactly like what you'd see from the "north star" or a "satellite" reflecting the sun, it was that bright.. however, the way i knew it wasn't a star, or a satellite was that it continued to ascend in a diagonal angle (and it wasn't in our atmosphere), i could tell due to it passing each of the "blind blades" until it got to a certain point literally in the center of the sky, i'd say a few miles up, then started to "wobble" sort of "bounce" and very slowly move around, but while remaining in the same position. now to just to clarify, i'm fully aware of illusions of movements occurring when you stare at a far off object for too long, however i made a point of not doing this, basically "refreshing" my eyes and looking away every so often, while eventually getting off the floor and opening the window.

 now as all of this is happening, i catch something in the very right hand corner of my peripherals.. it was a large blacker than black, completely silent, possibly over 1 mile in size from one chevron end of the craft to the other, no visible externals of any sort, or lights. now let me make it clear, that it was dead-silent, also about 3am, and only likely to be no more than a mile away, it was meant to be stealth, and not seen, or heard. needless to say, a craft over a mile in size hovering/moving in a straight line (opposite direction of the star object) with absolutely no noise, literally right over every hattiesburg building in altitude, gave me tremendous goose bumps as i called my friend dale immediately to tell him whats going on, as he's talking to me he's googling sightings in hattiesburg being the skeptic he is (very sneaky), he found a farmer family that had a sighting, and matched my exact description of the craft which completely blew his mind. also, keep in mind this guy is pretty closed minded, and very skeptical of everything; now i'm not that way personally, i was taught to never shut things out by my parents and i've always had a passionate interests and an absolute 100% knowing in other life beyond our planet visiting our world. it's common sense alone.

as the large black chevron moved forward consistently it left my view after about 5 minutes because it went past the edge of the apartments brick-wall of my apartment complex, so i ran around front, outside, but couldn't see anything due to how heavy the overcast was on the south-side of my apartment, so i went back inside and watched the star-like object continue to "bounce" so to speak in it's same position for the rest of the night. i was unable to sleep, so i continued to play games until about 6ish-am in the morning, while checking on the light every hour or so.. however i could not see the object any longer as soon as day broke, and i finally went to sleep.

various details - i tried to record or take pictures with my phone, sadly i had an iphone at the time, and the camera literally couldn't even pick up the bright star floating in the middle of the sky, and especially the black stealth object.

i've had a few other absolute "beyond what we know of mainstream technology wise" sightings, and the best part which i will report the other sighting as well, was with 2 other witnesses that watched the entire thing with me. basically 5 blue-star objects, half-v formation going thousands of mph across breckenridge apartments only a couple miles up, and then split off like 5 bottle rockets strapped together "loosely" and vanished instantaneously going in all opposite directions of each other no trails, (all bright blue stars) and dead-silent.

thanks for listening :) loved the steven greer sirius 2013 april 22nd documentary,that's what made me come here. i'll continue to update, i'm always looking up! (also my drawing of the craft should be wider "wing" span) but it's close. (please contact me through my email if you have any questions)
content.summary: 2 ufo's same time. 1 bright-white star-like obj. moving into position, 1 giant (1 mile long) chevron, 100-300 feet from the ground.

content.detailedDescription: It was 1994 or 1995 i am not too clear on the date because i was 4 or 5 years old at the time. i know it was late summer because it had to have been to be warm enough in wisconsin to swim in a pool. mom, dad and my two brothers, one was my twin and the other was a year younger and has autism. we went up there to madison to visit my uncles and other relatives. it was a long drive since we live in arkansas. we drove up there. anyway, after a long day, i guess i ended up falling asleep so i was put in this papasan chair with a blanket in a guest room. my mother tells me we all slept in the same room, i didn't hear any other noise from anyone in the house, but people must have been awake because no one else was in the room with me. it was like i was shielded from everyone else in that room or something. as i woke up, i seemed to be situated about 5 feet in front of the window in the chair. i am not sure but it seemed very quiet and dark. i remember feeling scared at first as i woke up, and when i looked at the window, because i saw light coming from it. there, right at the window, was an entity with its hands on the window sill, staring directly at me. as soon as i looked at its face, i immediately felt calm, unafraid, and actually curious. it, too, looked interested in me. you know how when you have the flash on a camera and you take a picture too close? how the light from the flash is so bright you can't really see the detail of someone or something? that's what the light on it's body looked like. a white light. but also, around its body, was this golden aura. almost metallic looking. it seemed to tilt its head sideways slightly. i remember its eyes were small, black, but it seemed to have a reassuring look. i felt like everything was going to be okay. it was like it was comforting me somehow. and then, after that, i must have lost consciousness. it was an odd atmosphere in the room for sure. i cannot explain it. i know there are gray aliens, reptilians, and other aliens but i have never heard of this particular type. i have researched everywhere and have come up with nothing. from what i could tell though, it seemed to observe children as if it was guarding me or protecting me from something. that's how i perceive it.
content.summary: Woke up from sleep and saw entity watching me from an open window, watched each other then eventually lost consciousness

content.detailedDescription: About2220 hours driving nb on hwy 400 north of king rd and about 2 km south  of aurora rd noticed an object pass over my vehicle. obeject was travelling north west at a very high rate of speed. all that could be seen was two rectangular more square than rectangular emitting and bright orange light. there was a space between the two rectangles. the rectangles were side by side. the objest was travelling at a very high rate of speed not lowering or lifting in the sky. it was out of sight in about 5 seconds. it made no sound what so ever. the only way i could describe the speed is to liken it to a jet fighter doing a fly by at a very high rate of speed very low to the ground. except this object was probably about 5000 feet in the air or more. it had no other lights of any kind. just to the west was a plan about same altitude heading in in a south east direction. strobes on plane were visable. plane did not make any course changes. the oblect flew so fast that no other description was noted
content.summary: Moving extremley fast emitting no sound

content.detailedDescription:
My brother was staying with me and was in the back garden having a cigarette when he asked me to join him in the garden to observe some 'weird lights' he noticed.
i just thought he was being daft but humoured him and went out to the garden.
he directed me to the horizon in a nw direction where i could indeed see 4-5 small white orbs moving around each other and phasing in and out of vision.
this went on for approximately ten minutes or so while we stood and watched the orbs.
then suddenly out of nowhere a large almond shaped object passed directly overhead with no sound and the skin of the object looked almost translucent. it made no sound and was maybe only 200 feet above the house. it was very big, maybe 200-300 feet in size and moved very slowly as if looking at us. it disappeared behind the neighbours house.
immediately after that one disappeared another one exactly the same flew over this time much much lower and all of the air and sound felt like it had been sucked out the area.
it too disappeared behind the house.
whilst my brother and i tried to take stock of what happened, a white/blue streak of light with a loud shriek flew from the right end of my house into the distance. the sound and light lasted for less than a second, but it was quite profound and startling. this was no firework.
immediately after that another of the same flew passed the house in a north to south direction and disappeared behind the neighbours opposite at the back of my garden.
my brother and i were immediately left feeling quite scared and apprehensive. there were no more incidences of this type but there were several more sightings of orbs over the following months.
we had no equipment to film or record this event, but we both know what we saw and having just watched the disclosure project i feel it is time for me to talk about this overwhelming and life changing event.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Several orbs in distance, moving around each other then two large tranlucent objects flew directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette when i first noticed the lights. i was looking at the star when i saw two lights that seemed so far away to appear star like but definitely within the atmosphere. i studied the object and determined they were ufo's. they were two glowing lights orange in color. they would move toward each other in a straight line then move apart. they did this continually for the entire time observed. i felt amazed, it seems i somehow always get what i ask for as i have wanted to see a ufo for the longest. i stopped observing the object because i was told by the police to go home as there have been an increase in home robberies by my house.
content.summary: Two orange lights would move toward each other then away then back for entire time observed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on rt 26 heading towards frederick, maryland on my way to oklahoma.  it was around 5:40am and still dark outside.  i had my mother-in-law with me.  she observed the object as well.

as we turned right onto rt 26 from rt 27, the only other vehicle we saw was a police vehicle in front of us heading in the same direction.  it quickly got out of our sight and we never saw the police vehicle again afterwards. 

i drove for a few short miles and then i (we) noticed a very large and bright light in the south-west sky, somewhere between a 30 to 45 degree angle from the ground.  well above the tree line, way to high to be any tower and much too large.  when i got closer, i could see detail.  

it looked like a building in the sky with an extremely bright glowing light emanating from the entire under side.  it had a metallic body.  it appeared round or oval from it's underside.  it had detail to it's body/building structure, even appeared to have possibly windows or portals by the way the light came from it.  

it never moved, just hovered in the sky.  the light coming from it's under side stayed steady and only after watching it for several minutes, then all of the sudden the light dimmed, however it was still very bright.  the light was an extremely bright glowing light.  it was not a light beam, but more like flood lights. to the right side of it, i could make out a small red glowing light. i could not make out any sound.

the sky was clear and dark.  i (we) saw no airplane, no helicopter, nothing at all except for this object.  when first approaching it, i said to my mother-in-law, "what is that?  do you see that?"  looking at it and seeing detail on it, i knew it was not even close to anything i've seen before in my life.  i am 46 years old and my mother-in-law is 81 (who's husband fought in wwii).  finally she said out of the blue, "it's the aliens watching us, i saw that very same thing a few weeks ago near our house in the middle of the night."  even her statement shocked me. i was mesmerized with this object, i didn't know what to do other than keep my eyes on it and still safely drive. 

we observed how it did not move, how extremely bright the light was, how completely different it was from any aircraft we had ever seen before, it was in no way an airplane or helicopter, it had no blinking lights nor lights in any similarness to them.  we watch it as i drove just sitting there in the sky over what appeared as open farm ground. eventually i past it to where i had to turn my head back to look at it, still just hovering in the sky.  then finally we were out of sight from it.  

a week later on our way home, coming through the very same area in daytime, we both studied the area in which we saw this object.  no towers of any kind, nothing but open farm land with some scattered houses around.
content.summary: Saw very large hovering object with a extremely bright glowing light illuminating the entire under side.  a metalic body that looked like a building in the sky, yet appeared round or oval.  watch it while driving.  object never moved from it's position.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my bed sleeping and i suddenly woke up, it was approximately 12:30 am, i looked out my skylight which was directly above me and saw a big, disc shaped object that had many flashing lights with different colors. it hovered  
over my skylight for about 10 seconds and then moved towards my window.
i jumped out of my bed and ran too the window. it was there for about 30 seconds when zoomed off, changing its direction many times before it stopped and ascended into the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A disc shaped object with flashing lights was hovering over my skylight, it zoomed away, and ascended into the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
i returned home for the evening on april 7, 2013 at approximately 8:30 pm.
once i had gotten settled i went outside to feed my dogs. my dogs wanted to play instead of eat, so i was throwing a ball for them to fetch. as they raced into the backyard to retrieve the ball i noticed a very unusally bright star-like object hovering high above my neighbors house.
 i yelled out to my brother to come take a look at it. at first we thought it may have been a planet, but after a few moments of staring at it the object began to travel slowly heading northeast. i quickly pulled out my cell phone and began to record the object but i could not see it on the screen. when looking at it, it was very bright and stood out aganist the dark sky, yet i recorded 30 or so seconds of just dark sky. in my frustration i switched to the regular camera and snapped a quick photo.
 it continued to pick up speed still continuing in a northeast direction. there was a helicopter approaching underneath the object but it was very low in comparision to the height of the object. as soon as the helicopter and object were almost perpendicular to eachother the object immediately turned its light out like a switch and it was gone.
 after the sighting my brother and i were still talking about how crazy what we had just seen was when i remembered that i had taken a photo. at first glance it appeared i had gotten nothing but as i zoomed in and started cropping the photo there is definitely something there. however, the camera caught the object in a different way then what we had seen with our eyes. in person it appeared to be a massive star, yet in the photo it looks like a small grey glow-worm. when the photo is further enhanced it looks almost like a constellation with the dots connected.
 i have no doubt after seeing the enhanced photo that this is way beyond the technological capabilities we have established here. i still have no idea what it was but it is something my brother and i won't soon forget...
content.summary: Bright star-like object hovering

content.detailedDescription: Driving back from horsham.Along the turnpike about 1/2 mile away from the toll both.Saw two glowing objects in sky front of my friends jeep.About 1/2 away and about 1 mile in the sky.As we arrived closer to the toll both i saw them more clear.They didn't blink or move just stayed still. asked my friend driving what is that in the sky.He replied he wasn't sure as well.By this time we were under the two objects.Now about 100 yards away from the toll both.We tried to look as long as we could not sure what we were seeing but know it wasn't anything we have even seen before.When we started to look back,behind us my friend saw three more ojects that apeared in the sky.The same look to them as the first two.Orange glow no movement.These objects were like in a triangle form when the other two just were like on a 45 degree slant.Were did these other three come from it was like someone turned on a light in the sky.These objects were lower than the cloud cover.As we arrived at the tool both we told the man to look in the sky and he saw what we did. 4 to 5 objects in the sky.Now they were about 1/2 mile away disrance from us.From were we first spotted them.We were glad to see that the man in the toll both saw this as well.He also told the other worker in the both next to him to look out and see. this man saw as well.After paying the toll we drove around try to see if we could see them but was to far from the turnpike.Iam glad me and my friend saw this together.I only wish i grabed my camera out of my tackel box that was in the back of his jeep.It all happened so fast.Maybe and i hope that we were not he only ones to see this besides the men working at the turnpike toll both.All and all really cool night.
content.summary: 4 to 5 orange glowing objects in sky above pa/nj turnpike. 4 people seen.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a friend in an rv driving back from a road trip. along the last part of our journey my friend said that she was seeing ufos in the sky. i didn't pay much attention to what she was looking at because i was focused on driving. at that point they looked like stars to me.

we parked at guernsey dairy in northville some time around midnight or 1 am and were going to sleep there for the night. we got out of the rv to stretch. i had a bottle of essential oil in my hand and dropped the cap. my friend said holy *#%^@$!! i was still looking for the cap that i dropped. she said look it is a ufo! at that point what i saw looked like a row of street lights. the lights were very bright however, i couldn't see anything. she was so shaken up it rattled me as well. so we got in the rv and drove to the nearest place we could think of, which was meijer, down the road. 

when we got to meijer it was getting light out! we got out of the rv and looked up into the sky. we saw 3 grey disc shaped objects floating up into the sky sort of like hovery the way leaves would fall from a tree, except going upwards. we tried to talk to several people coming out of the store but all ignored us except for one. that one person was a male and we asked him if he saw these objects ascending into the sky. he said that he could see them. we asked what they were, and named things like satellites, airplanes, etc. he said that they were none of the things that we mentioned and he said that he didn't know what they were. 

so we went back into the rv and tried to get some sleep. when we woke up after several hours we went to my ex mother-in-law's house to take showers. when my friend got out of the shower she showed me three red dots in the shape of a triangle on the right side of her belly. at that point for some strange reason i disregarded it! i made some excuse that maybe she had gotten bitten by fleas or something. it was bizarre, why would i disregard such a thing? 

so at any rate, i'm not posting this to freak anyone out. i just wanted to finally get this up on mufon. i had many many experiences after this, but nothing quite like this one. it would be difficult to explain what i've experienced with this sort of thing over the years, but i don't feel threatened by these encounters in any way. this may sound crazy after describing such an experience. what i can say is that these beings that are out there seem to be on another dimensional level
content.summary: 3 disc shaped craft sighting - approximately 4 hours of time loss

content.detailedDescription: Saw a "cruiser" or what i call the glowing white or multicolored lights that cruise through the sky and make no sound. these are becoming commonplace however, i haven't seen many in ludington. immediately after this particular sighting a plane flew by heading a somewhat similar trajectory. it was shining lights down on the ground and shined one right on me.
content.summary: Typical glowing cruiser - airplane shining lights down on me afterwards

content.detailedDescription:
Last summer i was with my mother and son at hackert lake. while they were swimming i sat on the beach. during my sit on the beach i happened to look up at the sky and saw something that in my minds eye initially thought was a bi-plane. upon looking at it longer i realized that if it was a bi-plane the wings would be thin and horizontal --- not cigar shaped. it just looked like a long light blue cigar shape flying in the sky with c shaped ends.

i watched it's trajectory and when it came to the nearest cloud, it went behind and never came back out again. this cloud was relatively small too. i kept watching it to see it reappear and it didn't. the clouds were small and spread far apart.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object over hackert lake

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed a glowing spherical object in downtown mecosta at dusk. it hovered above the moon and then slowly descended down. it faded out of sight at about the level of the trees. 

my partner and i have witnessed many of these however, a downward trajectory is pretty rare for us to see.
content.summary: Glowing orb hovering above moon and then descended down

content.detailedDescription: Was at work near stateline california.I was walking west and they caught my eye i don't know what they are. but they are round silver spheres i could see the light from sun reflecting off them. they moved slowly overhead for about one minute then made a sharp 90 degree turn northeast i could see air pressure as they turned they shot off at a speed i can't even describe.Totally clear skies. all i can say is there amazing whatever they are.
content.summary: Two silver spheres moving slow northwest. abrupt turn northeast at amazing speed.

content.detailedDescription: 11/30/12  11:02 pm on my way to pick up food at local vendor when i saw a triagular shaped object in the northeast sky with the center light much brighter than the other's .I stopped got out and took 2 photo's with my 4s i phone ,and continued on my way.When you zoom the photo ,the top right looks like lighting bolts going toward the object .I don't remember seeing any that night .
content.summary: Observed triangular shaped lights in sky, took photo's ,when zoomed it appear's as if lighting from top right of photo going to object

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard looking at the stars, i do that mostly on a clear night, this time there was a full moon, but i still went out to look around. that is when i saw a bright object comming from the n-w, and it seem to go right over patterson ca. at a angle to the s-e. it had no blinking lights on it and it was at least 2 times as bright as any star in the sky. 

as it went over head i flashed my flash light at it but i didn't get any response, i would not have flashed my light at it if it had blinking lights on it, also there was no noise at all comming from the object. i saw a object like this befor and they said it was sky lab? i look at my phone and it was 9:02 p.M. so if it was sky lab that should help. the object didn't make any weird moves or speed up or slow down any, and i think alot of people could have seen this object even with the full moon. on question #3, i didn't think it was a plane, i don't know why.#4 it was very bright and only one color, didn't make any quick moves.#5 i thought it would flash back when i flashed my lite at it but it didn't, and hope it wasen't sky lab.#6 it just went out of view.
content.summary: I saw a bright object comming from the n-e, very bright went right over patterson, ca 95363. traveled s-e at a angle, no blinking lights or noise. i flashed my flash lite at it but no response. lasted approx 25 to 30 secounds, it look low in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were out walking our dog leroy up the street toward the north. i looked up at the sky to see if anything was happening out of the unusual and sighted two blinking lighted objects speeding across the sky to the west of my backyard. it passed behind the tallest tree in our yard. the first two were very close together moving in a straight path for the most part. just as they passed out of view the rearward one abruptly changed directions for a small space and passed the forward object, and they together passed beyond the horizon in a northerly direction. about ten seconds later a third object identical in lighting and direction as the other two objects.
the objects were flashing lights on the bottom that not only varied in color but direction of the lights from side to side as well as back to front. there was no rhyme or reason to them some was all white and other times it had various colors some all the same and some were different colors and sometimes a single light in the middle of the bottom of the craft would show.
all three craft showed these light patterns as they crossed the sky. the craft made no noise as they crossed the sky.
content.summary: Three ufos with flashing lights moving at a great speed accross sky west of my back yard

content.detailedDescription: I opened a window before i went to bed. 10 seconds later i stared at the window opening looking at the clear night sky and suddenly bright orange light appeared out of nowhere aprox. 500m from my house. it glowed, had constant speed for 2sec and followed almost straight path. at first i tought it was another meteor falling down but than i relized there is no burning glow or tail or anything and before i could make any sense of it - it disappeared - only to make itselfe visible once agains just moment later, then it rapidly turned and continoued going straight foreward with an elevated path-opposite of falling! after a constant 2secs visible flight it disappeared again in thin air. there was no noise the whole time. i never saw a ufo before, i studied astronomy in high school and i know how celestial objects behave. after sighting i stared at the nigt sky for about 10min searching for the object. finnaly i decided to share this with the world by typing ufo reporting in google with no hope of finding website like this.
content.summary: Orange star like sphere appeared out of nowhere moving with constant speed almost streight, glowed, disappeared, reapeared and immediatly changed direction from heading north to north-east with elevated straight path and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I believe i have located a spectacular extraterrestrial anomaly that was probably overlooked or missed by nasa. otherwise it would have probably gotten airbrushed out. this is a definite constructed probable vehicle, no mistake about it, a clear view, not fuzzy.Here is where it's located zoom in big time and you'll be astounded--- planet mercury, year2008  m16 pia11356.Jpg messenger's fly by   jan 16 2008   en0108821483m.Pnj
 at first you see a big dark crator but whe you zoom in a little dull white spot appears, keep zooming in and then behold. 

1. i located the object on line
2. looking for anomalies on planetary surfaces
3. white color 
4. it appears to be a somewhat geometric shaped long vehicle with two protusions on each side. it sits motionless on the ground. a small same colored piece lays off one end ,maybe broken off due to a possible landing,( my own thought). 
5. enthusiasm i videotaped it for my own record
6. it's there for all to see.
  
thanks (nightsky)
content.summary: This a craft sitting on the floor of a crator on planet mercury

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside on my balcony and observed a grayish looking light that was moving all around the sky...I called my husband to come look with me and also the neighbor was there as well downstairs....So the ball moved around for like 1-2 mins in the same spot then it took off to the northwest in the sky really fast...
content.summary: Wild

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home from town traveling east on hwy 182. upon arrival at the 4 way stop that i would turn right at to go home i noticed this huge light pattern about 1/4 mile ahead, on the south side of the hiway. it was stationary. the lights looked too clear and vivid to be real and it's ruby redness captivated me while confusing me greatly. my first thought was that a new cell phone tower had been put up, but i felt mentally confused as if i couldn't think clearly. i turned right onto the road that i live on and then turned into a convenience store parking lot to get a better look at what i was seeing. there was a car there with a couple teens standing outside their car and i thought initially that they were looking at the object. i am not sure if they were or not because the clarity and the gem like quality of those lights made me quickly forget to look to see if they were also staring at the object. but what is strange about this experience is my state of mind which had changed into something like being under the influence of some drug, almost a dream like state that affected me as i watched this object with its beautiful lights. i think there was probably 8 lights outlining the rectangular object that looked as tall as a two story house and as long as a very large house. and no more than 1/4 mile in the distance, over the trees, perhaps around a hundred feet up in the air above the trees. i sit and watched the beautiful red and white lights and noticed that it was moving very slowly, a creep towards the south. in fact its movement was so slow that you could hardly tell it was moving at all, but it was. i sit there perhaps for 5 minutes watching it move like the hands on a clock to the south until it moved out of my sight, still over the woods that stretch southward from this hiway. it made no noise. 

i have never seen something like this that would be termed a ufo. and i am 62 years old. there is no explanation for this, being too large to be a copter and silent to boot. generally i am the type of guy that is curious and normally would have driven towards it to get in closer, yet i had no urge to do that, which is weird. upon arrival at home i would have generally told everyone about what i saw, but i didn't. and i don't know why. it wss only when i began to think about it today that i felt i should report this as it needs to be documented. i am not a ufo nut. yet i saw something here that cannot be explained by earthly things. i saw something that was just like a ruby with an internal light source, brilliant and so beautiful to look at. i have never seen earthly lights that looked close to this. these were just too vivid, too clear, with the lights being about the size of a pea if you held the pea up at arm's length. in the shape of a huge two story house, longer than it was high. i could not see an object behind the lights, but they were on something, outlining it. i am more bothered by the change in my consciousness at that moment than the object itself. it affected my behavior when i was observing it. and i cannot explain exactly how it affected my behavior, except that i didn't get closer which i certainly would have done if my mind had been working the way i am used to.
content.summary: Rectangular with jewel like red and white lights giving it a rectangular shape,

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on i17 on my way to work. i was carpooling with a co-worker.  we were just past happy valley rd and before pinacle peak rd.  on the west side of the interstate floating above the ground about 100 ft was a black rectangle about 30-50 feet long and about 10 feet in height.  the black sides were smooth and dark, like blackened windows, along the sides of it as far as i could tell. on the bottom where white round circles about 3 ft in diameter, that covered the entire bottom. my co-worker said "those things must be how it stays up there."  as we passed by we went under the pinacle peak rd overpass.  we turned back to see if it was still there and could not locate it.  when the went on down i17 to work.  it was approximately 630 am in the morning, as we had to be at work by 7 am. i believe it was sunday, but it could have been saturday.  if it was saturday then it could have been as early as 530 am, because we had to be at work by 6 am. it was dawn or pre-dawn as the sky was starting to light up, but i don't remember the sun actually being up over the horizon. i am thinking that this happened about april 24/25 2010, but it may have been at the end of march.  i didn't know that you could report these type of things until now, but i have never forgot about it.  my co-worker and i never discussed it afterward, only laughing at the time when we so it, saying that now we saw a ufo and it was sort of small and lame. there were very few cars on i17 at that time, and i have always wondered if anyone else saw it or reported it. it was not a balloon, and it was not hanging from anything, like a crane. i didnt think much about it until later, then it creeped me out.  i was thinking that it looked like an observation room or deck that was floating in the sky, and not up on a ridge or on top a building were it should be.  i was thinking that it was supposed to be invisible, and somehow the "cloaking" device was accidently turned off, or maybe they wanted to be seen for a brief time. anyway, would really like to know if anyone else saw it, or if it has been seen in the phoenix area before or after. i have no photo as we did not stop, but my photo is one i found on the internet that is close to what i saw.  i am thinking that the photo is of a much bigger craft. thanks
content.summary: Rectangle black craft hovering between i17 @ happy valley rd on west side close to juvenile detention center

content.detailedDescription: Bbqing with family around 8:00 pm oct 2000  at our home in irvington al. it was me and my husband and it was dark. from the west across the street there is a wooded lot. over the trees came the object it was a black triangle matte finish with 3 white lights on the underside that were a constant glow, it was huge bigger than a football field its depth was maybe one to two stories tall, it was solid and it was moving very slowly. i could have hit it with a rock.And i started to shake. it moved right over us and was not making a sound,  my husband thought he heard a humming sound but i did not hear it. we watched it move over us for about 30 sec then  i ran into the house to get my daughter. when i came back out it was still moving to the east very slowly till we could no longer see it.  it did not make a sound but just kept moving  very slowly toward mobile al. i was phsically shaken not knowing what it was. my husband did not want to talk about it.  we could not understand how something so big could just float by with no sound. we could just watch it and not believe what we were seeing. my husband thought people would think we were crazyif we reported it. i watched the news that night to see if anyone else had seen it but there was nothing about it. it was so large and that i can not believe no else had seen it. i was watching a ufo files program about sightings in illinois about the time we had our sighting, and the descritpion of the object was exactly the same as what we saw.
content.summary: Larger than football field, no sound, blk matte triangle with whiite light at each corner could have hit it with a rock very slow over house .

content.detailedDescription: Sept.7 2010 i was on the patio looking at the stars n to ne over the top of a mountain range aprox. 15 miles away. in the corner of my left eye i saw a white light appear over the horizion coming from the north to the south direction. object moved at high rate of speed untill almost diretley overhead of my position and disappeared as i started to turn and follow the light. from the north mountain range. mt wilson area to where i was is about fifteen + miles .Travel time was about 4-5 seconds . i looked around sky for object for aprox 6-7 seconds and the light reappered in the same area as disappered and proceded to go back to the north at same rate of speed and disappered over the mtn range . i stayed out looking for the light or anything else i could see for about 20 minits when the light reappered again. the light seemed to follow the mtn. range from north to east for about 10-15 miles and then went over the mountain range and out of sight . have not seen this again. i include the following because i feel there is a connection . 2012  early may at aprox. 7:30 pm i was out on the patio looking at stars as it seemed somone had painted the sky and you could reach up and get ahandfull . i remembered watching a tv show the universe or similar and listened to the host say the naked eye can only see about 3000 stars and to see more try binoculars . i got my 20x50 binocs and was looking at the brite stars and was impressed and amazed at how many stars i could see . when i looked almost straight over my head  from behind my line of sight came a grayish white round disk! kind of like a tums or alkaseltzer tablet. no colors,beams or rays. this disk disappered by sliding into a slit in the night sky . picture slowly sliding a tums into an envelope untill you cant see it . this sighting took about 3-4 seconds . have not seen this again. this event is what promted me to send this report . are they connected ? dont know .I have several other sightings of orange lights chasing each other and the small red light that zooms all over the night sky.I was transfixed and in awe of what i was seeing. the 2012 sighting is what promted me to repot  and has converted me from a skeptic to a believer .
content.summary: White star like orb but larger north to south. no glow or reflections or rays .

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home, on my balcony smoking a cigarette. i live on a 5th floor so i have a pretty good view of the city and it's surrounding hills and mountains. i was looking at the sky, as i always do, when i'm on balcony. in the first minute i wasn't sure what i was looking at but after 2-3 minutes i started thinking that was my first ufo sighting. the object appeared out of nowhere and was stationary. it was emitting different lights including white, blue, green, red and yellow. it stayed there for about 4 or 5 minutes total. 

about 10 days after that i was at my balcony again looking at that part of the sky, where ufo appeared. then it appeared again with same characteristics as before. this time it stayed for a little bit shorter period of time. at that time i was sure that what i saw was an actual ufo.

month or so, after the 2nd sighting i saw red light going forward and backward behind the mountain. it did that for about 10 to 15 times. i could see the path it was going on and it's trail was fading away as the ufo was moving away.

three months after that i was going out. it was about 6 or 7pm. the day was really sunny and i could see two dozens of airplanes and the trails they were leaving behind them. i looked at the "avaz twist tower" and next to it i saw a metallic disc-shaped craft hovering in the air. the car was coming along the road so i had to step onto sidewalk and i turned my head for about a second but when i looked back at the sky nothing was there.

i'm pretty sure that what i saw wasn't an airplane or helicopter because i'm used to seeing it all the time. i will never forget this short period of my life because i always believed in extraterrestrial life and now, i have witnessed something i saw reading about years and years prior to that.
content.summary: Orb-like, emitting different colors

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside looking at the sky because there was supposed to be a meteor shower. i saw 3 bright lights that made a triangle come out of nowhere moving quickly from east to west. i saw it stop and hover above my yard i freaked out and ran inside and woke up my husband. by the time i got him outside it was gone.
content.summary: 3 orange lights shaped like a triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette with my friend, who will also confirm this sighting as he was standing right next to me. i've been an avid stargazer since birth, i follow ufology, and i have always believed that we were not alone in the universe long before anybody had brought the debate up. feeling quite robbed of my ability to see the lyrid meteor shower last night, as there was very dense cloud cover in my area, i decided to see if i could see anything tonight. as we went outside to smoke, we light our cigarettes, and as we often do, looked up. i was just glancing around trying to decide which constellation to marvel at, and as i did i looked to what i think was the star, alphard, i don't know my stars super well this was after the fact using starmap 3d, anyway, what i thought was a star begins to move slowly across the sky. as i had just stared to watch it i thought, "oh, just another plane." as i live very close to bwi and there's constant air traffic over my house. but then as it got closer, i didn't hear any jet engine sounds as i normally always do, and as i watched it move across the sky, it seemed to be weaving, from left to right, in somewhat of a line, as it flew. i thought this was odd for a plane to be flying in this manner, and let out a, "hmph.", as if puzzled and as my friend dave knew what that sound meant, he began to watch what i was as well. we both obseverd this object for about 5 minutes, and at the very end of the sighting it made a very abrupt 90 degree turn and the light vanished, which is something i have never observed personally until last night. it left me with goosebumpbs as i had been waiting my entire life to observe a ufo first hand, unfortunately without the foresight to bring a video camera i didn't capture anything. but it felt unreal to me, i tried as i could to logically explain away what we had both witnessed. perhaps a sattelite, for example. but the more i tried, the more it seemed apparent to me that i couldn't explain away what i had seen, which led me to believe that i did in fact observe a ufo.
content.summary: The point of light traveled across the sky in a strange, but mostly straight path. traveled what would be the eqiuvalent to about 8 inhes across the sky, then abruptly made a 90 degree turn and immediately dissappeared with no noise throughout.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in cottage hills il. with my best friend facing east in my friends driveway, when all of a sudden we both noticed a strange light in the the sky. i immediatly took out my smartphone and began recording.Then all of a sudden above the original object. 3 more appeared in a formation. note there is a local small airport. (stl regional airport) less than 2 miles away from where i am standing, and these objects that are appearing.I lived there almost all my life. i know what small planes land there and the sounds the make.These objects were hovering silently.  shortly after i did hear helicopters getting closer to the area where the objects were last seen. right about this time was the last time i saw the objects they just vanished. i am 100% convinced these objects were not man made. i am not the only person who seen the phenom. i posted the video on facebook and several of my friends seen the same light as i did from diffrent locations.

i first noticed the object cause of the size and light, and it not moving and flashing
content.summary: Observed object then all of a sudden more appear

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out of the back of my house into the back yard. i turned south and proceeded to smoke my cigarette. i usually look up at the sky during the night time and tonight i just happened to notice a bright, star-like light/object going across the sky. it was about the distance that a passenger jet would fly. 35,000 feet maybe? at first i thought it was an airplane, but noticed that it was too bright to be an airplane and there were no blinking lights indicating that it was an airplane. it was not producing any sort of streak or "tail" and was also not producing any sound from where i witnessed the object.

it moved very smoothly from west to east and seemed to be going faster than a passenger jet would be able to go. it was very bright. so bright that i wasn't able to make out the shape of any object, other than an orb-like object that moved very much like an orb, but in a straight line. it had the color of a white star that you would see on a clear night sky, but it was much brighter and it was below the cloud line. as i was viewing this very bright object for the next 45 seconds or so, the object just seemed to vanish. i did notice though, that when the object seemed to "disappear" it was directly in front of the moon. however, it was no longer in the vicinity. 

i believe that if the object would not have been so bright, it would have been very possible to make out the shape of whatever that object was. in this case, that was not possible. it was not a plane or a shooting star i do know that.
content.summary: Bright, star-like shape moved quietly across the sky and vanished
